entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Int'l Airport 6:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
